query.title: Search term or URL
query.description: Enter Google Search keywords or a URL of a specific web page. The keywords might include the [advanced search operators](https://blog.apify.com/how-to-scrape-google-like-a-pro/). Examples: - san francisco weather - https://www.cnn.com - function calling site:openai.com

language.title: Language
language.description: enter a language the tweets will be generated in

audience.title: Target audience of the content
audience.description: enter a description of the target audience that will be passed into the LLM

emojiUsage.title: Emoji usage
emojiUsage.description: enter a quantity of emojis used in generated post

maxTweets.title: Maximum number of tweets
maxTweets.description: enter a maximum number of chained tweets (1/X, 2/X, ...) generated

maxResults.title: Maximum number of results by the RAG web browser
maxResults.description: enter a maximum number of results returned by the RAG web browser

scrapperMemoryLimit.title: Memory limit of the RAG web scrapper
scrapperMemoryLimit.description: set memory limit of the scrapper actor. Memory limits of (tweet-style-content-generator)+(rag-web-browser) need to be <= your memory limit
